definition: resembling human beings, any member of the suborder Anthropoidea including monkeys and apes and hominids
details:
adjective
- resembling human beings
= synonyms: manlike
- resembling apes
= synonyms: apelike
noun
- any member of the suborder Anthropoidea including monkeys and apes and hominids
- person who resembles a nonhuman primate
= synonyms: ape
